name: UU (itch)
description:
A nice little game for U and your friends to have a bit of fun in.

I hope U enjoy it! This is the first game I have made all the way to the point of being published, so I'm quite happy about it. 

If you're reading this and U don't mind, could U also comment a little something about it after U give it a try? Even if this isn't your favorite game and U are being straight-up, it's nice to hear people expressing their thoughts.

I will probably work on this game a little bit more and add a few more features, so if U have any feature ideas, questions, or feedback, feel free to lemme know in the mini-forum I made below.

Thank U!
